database.name: VIEW EFIN_ADJUNICODE_ADVTYPE_V
database.view: SELECT c_validcombination.c_validcombination_id AS efin_adjunicode_advtype_v_id, c_validcombination.ad_org_id, c_validcombination.ad_client_id, c_validcombination.updatedby, c_validcombination.updated, c_validcombination.created, c_validcombination.isactive, c_validcombination.createdby, c_validcombination.account_id, c_validcombination.c_salesregion_id, c_validcombination.c_campaign_id, c_validcombination.c_project_id, c_validcombination.c_activity_id, c_validcombination.user1_id, c_validcombination.user2_id, c_validcombination.c_bpartner_id, c_validcombination.em_efin_uniquecode FROM c_validcombination WHERE c_validcombination.ad_org_id IS NOT NULL AND (c_validcombination.account_id IN (SELECT c_elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id FROM c_elementvalue WHERE c_elementvalue.accounttype = 'A')) AND c_validcombination.account_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.c_salesregion_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.c_campaign_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.c_project_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.c_activity_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.user1_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.user2_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.c_bpartner_id IS NOT NULL AND c_validcombination.em_efin_dimensiontype = 'A'
